Detailed Description

Describes statistics information about a module.

Also contains the maps this module has loaded in RAM. Should inherit from MapStatistics or something.

Definition at line 34 of file ModuleList.h.

uint32 ModuleNotice::getProcessTime (   )  const
 

Returns the average processingtime of the module.

If the processing time is zero the function will return one to avoid giving all packets to a module with a hung processor.

Returns:
The average processingtime.

uint32 ModuleNotice::getRank (   )  const

(In case of the leader terminating.)

Returns:
